entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 5:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 21 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 21 north of Terrenceville. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 except minus 17 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22 except minus 17 along the coast. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
